user.title: Configure Smart Boiler
user.description: Set up your Smart Boiler integration.

data_description.dhw_outlet_temp: Select the sensor for DHW outlet temperature.
data_description.cold_water_inlet_temp: Select the sensor for cold water inlet temperature.
data_description.heating_outlet_temp: Select the sensor for heating outlet temperature.
data_description.heating_return_temp: Select the sensor for heating return temperature.
data_description.flue_gas_temp: Select the sensor for flue gas temperature (measured outside the flue).
data_description.power_entity: Select the sensor for boiler power consumption.
data_description.power_threshold_standby: Set the power threshold for standby mode (in Watts).
data_description.power_threshold_dhw: Set the power threshold for DHW mode (in Watts).
data_description.power_threshold_circulator: Set the power threshold for circulator mode (in Watts).
data_description.power_threshold_heating: Set the power threshold for heating mode (in Watts).
